actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member of the House of Representatives (including Delegates and Resident Commissioners) to hire for two months during the period from June 1 to August 31 inclusive, each year during the Ninety-third Congress, one additional employee to be known as a Lyndon Baines Johnson teacher congressional intern.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.
